name: example-equip-project
description: Equip is a PSR-7 compliant [Action Domain Responder](https://github.com/pmjones/adr) (ADR) system. While it may look like a micro-framework (and it is), it is more like a wrapper around the real logic of your application domain. It's also [PSR-1](http://www.php-fig.org/psr/psr-1/), [PSR-2](http://www.php-fig.org/psr/psr-2/), and [PSR-4](http://www.php-fig.org/psr/psr-4/) compliant.
